Apos.​Gui.​Default
public static
Apos.​Gui.​Default

Predefined inputs for Mouse, Keyboard, Gamepad, Touchscreen.

Public Variables
ConditionHoverMouse
public static Func<Component, bool> ConditionHoverMouse
Returns

Returns true when the mouse is inside the clip area of a component.

ConditionGotHovered
public static Func<Component, bool> ConditionGotHovered
Returns

Returns true when a component just got hovered.

ConditionInteraction
public static Func<Component, bool> ConditionInteraction
Returns

Returns true when gamepad 0's A button or space or enter or left mouse button are released.  The left mouse button requires that the component is hovered.

ConditionPreviousFocus
public static Func<bool> ConditionPreviousFocus
Returns

Returns true when gamepad 0's left thumbstick has just been made positive or the up arrow key is released.

ConditionNextFocus
public static Func<bool> ConditionNextFocus
Returns

Returns true when gamepad 0's left thumbstick has just been made negative or the down arrow key is released.

ConditionBackFocus
public static Func<bool> ConditionBackFocus
Returns

Returns true when gamepad 0's B button is released or the escape key is released.

ConsumeCondition
public static Func<Component, bool> ConsumeCondition
Returns

Always returns true. This is useful when you want a condition to mark an input as used.  When an input is marked as used, the component will request to be put in focus.

IsScrolled
public static Func<Component, bool> IsScrolled
Returns

Returns true when a component is hovered and the mouse wheel is being scrolled.

ScrollVertically
public static Func<Component, bool> ScrollVertically
Returns

This should be strictly used on a panel so that it can be scrolled vertically.

See Also

  • IsScrolled

ScrollHorizontally
public static Func<Component, bool> ScrollHorizontally
Returns

This should be strictly used on a panel so that it can be scrolled horizontally.

See Also

  • IsScrolled

Public Functions
CreateButton
public static Component CreateButton(
string t,
Func<Component, bool> operation,
Action<Component> grabFocus
)

Creates a button with a label that becomes white on hover.  The button can be interacted with using gamepad 0, keyboard and mouse.  Adds a border of size 20 around the label.

Parameters
t
string

The string to use for the label.

operation
Func<Component, bool>

The action that the button does when interacted with.

grabFocus
Action<Component>

A way for the component to request focus.

Returns

Returns the button that was created.

Func<string> ld,
Func<Component, bool> operation,
Action<Component> grabFocus
)

Creates a button with a dynamic label that becomes white on hover.  The button can be interacted with using gamepad 0, keyboard and mouse.  Adds a border of size 20 around the label.

Parameters
ld
Func<string>

A function that returns a string.

operation
Func<Component, bool>

The action that the button does when interacted with.

grabFocus
Action<Component>

A way for the component to request focus.

Returns

Returns the button that was created.

CreateButton
public static Component CreateButton(
Component c,
Func<Component, bool> operation,
Action<Component> grabFocus
)

Creates a button with a custom component.  The button can be interacted with using gamepad 0, keyboard and mouse.  Adds a border of size 20 around the component.

Parameters
c
Component

The component to give to the button.

operation
Func<Component, bool>

The action that the button does when interacted with.

grabFocus
Action<Component>

A way for the component to request focus.
